description: LastPass says its almost 12-hour outage yesterday was caused by a bad update to its Google Chrome extension. [...]
title: LastPass says 12-hour outage caused by bad Chrome extension update

description: British auction house Christie's is notifying individuals whose data was stolen by the RansomHub ransomware gang in a recent network breach. [...]
title: Christie's starts notifying clients of RansomHub data breach

description: Frontier Communications is warning 750,000 customers that their information was exposed in a data breach after an April cyberattack claimed by the RansomHub ransomware operation. [...]
title: Frontier warns 750,000 of a data breach after extortion threats

description: Following massive customer pushback after it announced the new AI-powered Recall for Copilot+ PCs last month, Microsoft says it will update the feature to be more secure and require customers to opt in to enable it. [...]
title: Microsoft makes Windows Recall opt-in, secures data with Windows Hello

description: A new PHP for Windows remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability has been disclosed, impacting all releases since version 5.x, potentially impacting a massive number of servers worldwide. [...]
title: PHP fixes critical RCE flaw impacting all versions for Windows
